goal: Create publishable CLI for AI automation tools, runnable via npx @okam/ai

tasks.title: Generate library scaffolding
tasks.notes: Generated with NX generator. Fixed tsconfig.json module setting (commonjs -> ESNext) for ESM compatibility. Removed library-specific eslint.config.mjs to use root @antfu/eslint-config. Verified build, lint, and test all pass.

tasks.title: Install commander dependency
tasks.notes: Installed commander@14.0.2. Verified build, lint, and test all still pass.

tasks.title: Create CLI entry point
tasks.description: Create libs/ai/src/cli.ts with commander setup, imports for ralph/init/archive commands, and program.parse()
tasks.notes: Created cli.ts with commander setup. Command imports are commented out until commands are implemented. Added commander to libs/ai/package.json dependencies. Build, lint, and tests all pass.

tasks.title: Create init command
tasks.description: Create libs/ai/src/commands/init.ts - creates prd.json template and progress.txt, errors if file exists
tasks.notes: Created init command with prd.json and progress.txt templates. Supports --force flag to overwrite. Uses process.stdout.write for CLI output (linter disallows console.log). Registered in cli.ts. Build, lint, and tests all pass.

tasks.title: Create archive command
tasks.description: Create libs/ai/src/commands/archive.ts - moves prd.json and progress.txt to archive/ with timestamp
tasks.notes: Created archive command that moves prd.json and progress.txt to archive/ folder. Files are renamed with pattern: {type}_{project-slug}_{date}.{ext}. Creates archive/ directory if needed. Registered in cli.ts. Build, lint, and tests all pass.

tasks.title: Create ralph command
tasks.description: Create libs/ai/src/commands/ralph.ts - loads config, checks PRD exists, spawns ralph.sh with env vars
tasks.notes: Created ralph.ts with commander setup. Supports options: --model (default: claude-sonnet-4-20250514), --context (additional context path), --prd (prd.json path), --progress (progress.txt path). Validates PRD exists before spawning ralph.sh. Sets RALPH_MODEL, RALPH_CONTEXT, RALPH_PRD, RALPH_PROGRESS env vars. Registered in cli.ts. Build, lint, and tests all pass.

tasks.title: Create portable ralph.sh script
tasks.description: Create libs/ai/scripts/ralph.sh - reads config from env vars (RALPH_MODEL, RALPH_CONTEXT, RALPH_PRD, RALPH_PROGRESS)
tasks.notes: Created libs/ai/scripts/prd-agent.sh (renamed from ralph.sh to avoid .gitignore conflict). Script reads RALPH_MODEL, RALPH_CONTEXT, RALPH_PRD, RALPH_PROGRESS env vars. Builds dynamic Claude prompt with context path and PRD references. Supports iteration loop with failure detection. Updated ralph.ts to spawn prd-agent.sh. Configured project.json to copy scripts/ to dist. Build, lint, and tests all pass.

tasks.title: Configure project.json build
tasks.description: Update libs/ai/project.json - esbuild executor, platform node, format esm, bundle true, assets for scripts/
tasks.notes: Updated project.json: changed format from cjs to esm, added additionalEntryPoints for cli.ts. Build now outputs index.js and cli.js in ESM format. Completed as part of Task 9 since package.json config required matching build output.

tasks.title: Configure package.json
tasks.description: Update libs/ai/package.json - add bin field, type module, publishConfig, engines node >=20
tasks.notes: Configured package.json with: type=module, bin field pointing to ./cli.js, exports for ESM, main/types, engines node>=20, publishConfig access=public, license BUSL-1.1, repository URL. Also updated project.json to build ESM format with CLI entry point. CLI --help verified working.

tasks.title: Add unit tests for init command
tasks.description: Create libs/ai/src/commands/init.spec.ts - test file creation, error on existing file
tasks.notes: Created 8 unit tests covering: file creation, prd.json structure validation, progress.txt header, error on existing files (single and both), --force flag override, success message output. All tests pass. Lint passes.

tasks.title: Add unit tests for archive command
tasks.description: Create libs/ai/src/commands/archive.spec.ts - test file move, timestamp format, error handling
tasks.notes: Created 13 unit tests covering: error when prd.json missing, archiving both files, archive directory creation, existing archive directory handling, skip missing progress.txt, slugify project name, truncate long project names, default slug for missing/empty project field, invalid JSON handling, ISO date format, file content preservation, success messages. All tests pass. Lint passes.

tasks.title: Add to nx.json release config
tasks.description: Add ai to release.projects array in nx.json
tasks.notes: Already present in nx.json release.projects array (was added during initial scaffolding in Task 1).

tasks.title: Build and verify
tasks.description: Run npx nx build ai, verify dist/libs/ai/cli.js --help works, scripts/ folder present
